title: "Storm Watch News"
content:
**Welcome to Storm Watch News!**

Stay informed about the latest weather updates and breaking news with our reliable coverage. Our team of expert meteorologists and journalists work around the clock to bring you up-to-date information on storms, severe weather conditions, and other important events.

With our user-friendly interface, it's easy to navigate through our website and find the information you need. Whether you're looking for live radar maps, storm alerts, or in-depth analysis of current weather patterns, we've got you covered.

Don't get caught off guard by severe weather - trust Storm Watch News to keep you informed and prepared.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a stormy sky with lightning bolts for a weather or news website"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
